text: Beauvais-Tille Airport is one of the two main airports serving Paris, France. It's in the city of Beauvais and the airport has limited operating hours, being closed every night between 23:30 and 06:30 due to local noise restrictions as it is located in a quiet residential area. The main terminal has a few restaurants and stores. Category:Airports in Paris Category:Beauvais
